      • heuristic

        public int heuristic(int cost,
                     Node goal)
        The heuristic is calculate with the Manhattan distance, and the cost to reach the current node.
        Parameters:
        cost - the cost to reach the current node.
        goal - where to go.
        Returns:
        the heuristic from the current node to the goal.
